body_html:
Yeah, eventually I was able to compile it with gcc 4.8.5 after fixing some headers and downloading some missing library, as discussed here.

Will try and build gcc 5.5 at some point, I was not able to do that with gcc 6.3, there are some known issues with gcc 6 and Ubuntu 17.10.
body_text:
Yeah, eventually I was able to compile it with gcc 4.8.5 after fixing some headers and downloading some missing library, as discussed here.
Will try and build gcc 5.5 at some point, I was not able to do that with gcc 6.3, there are some known issues with gcc 6 and Ubuntu 17.10.
body:
Yeah, eventually I was able to compile it with `gcc 4.8.5` after fixing some headers and downloading some missing library, as discussed [here](https://medium.com/@Inoryy/compiling-pytorch-4-0-on-ubuntu-17-10-with-cuda-9-0-and-python-3-6-6769a0df56d5). 

Will try and build `gcc 5.5` at some point, I was not able to do that with `gcc 6.3`, there are some known issues with `gcc 6` and `Ubuntu 17.10`.
